about.details:
Founded in 2009, Gajanand International Limited, formerly known as Gajanand Cottex Private Limited, is engaged in the production of contamination-free and sustainable cotton.

The company's product portfolio includes:

  1. Mech1 cotton: grown in Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra, it is sown in the June/July period and harvested from November to January.
  2. Shankar6 cotton: This is grown domestically and is the most exported raw cotton variety in India.
  3. DCH 32 cotton: It is sown in the months of July-August and is ready for harvest from December to March. It is grown in the states of Karnataka, Tamil Nadu and Madhya Pradesh.
  4. Khol: It is made from high-quality and pure cotton seeds.

Company strengths:

  • The company has an installed capacity of 37,500 MT/year
  • Location advantage: Raw material harvesting nearby/easy availability and readily available transportation.
  • Increasing scalability of the company and self-consumption: By expanding its operations and diversifying its product offering, the company has improved its ability to adapt quickly to changing market demand.

As of March 31, 2024, the company had 22 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Gajanand International IPO?
faqs.answer:
Gajanand International IPO is a SME IPO of 5736000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.65 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 9, 2024, and closes on September 11, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Gajanand International IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Gajanand International IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Gajanand International IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Gajanand International IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Gajanand International IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Gajanand International IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Gajanand International IPO opens on September 9, 2024 and closes on September 11, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Gajanand International IPO?
faqs.answer: Gajanand International IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Gajanand International IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Gajanand International IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Gajanand International IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Gajanand International IPO will be done on Thursday, September 12, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, September 13, 2024. Check the Gajanand International IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Gajanand International IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Gajanand International IPO listing date is on Monday, September 16, 2024.
